page.title: 14Y.M.C.A. IN BARNARD CASTLE
page.content: Most of the recreation for Barnard Castle children is provided by the Y.M.C.A.as well as a growing number of adult clubs.It is housed in a small building,having ahall which can be hired by the public for functions or parties.This is also where the judo club,playgroup or boys and girls clubs can enjoy themselves.It also acts as a dining room for the Luncheon Club for the elderly.In the coffee bar is a pool table and are a variety of electronic games added to which is a disco area and upstairs,the careers office.In other words,some provisions is made for all ages from toddler to O.A.P.Being a small building and catering for a growing demand in the town,there was insufficient room,so the town council rented them a larger building in the town centre.
